sn46.14:4.1: * Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn46.14:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā mahākassapo pippaliguhāyaṃ viharati ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
sn46.14:4.3: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā mahākassapo tenupasaṅkami;
sn46.14:4.5: Nisajja kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ mahākassapaṃ etadavoca:
sn46.14:5.2: Kacci dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti, no abhikkamanti;
sn46.14:5.5: Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti;
sn46.14:6.1: “Sattime, kassapa, bojjhaṅgā mayā sammadakkhātā bhāvitā bahulīkatā abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattanti.
sn46.14:6.3: Satisambojjhaṅgo kho, kassapa, mayā sammadakkhāto bhāvito bahulīkato abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati … pe …
sn46.14:6.4: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo kho, kassapa, mayā sammadakkhāto bhāvito bahulīkato abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
sn46.14:6.5: Ime kho, kassapa, satta bojjhaṅgā mayā sammadakkhātā bhāvitā bahulīkatā abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattantī”ti.
sn46.14:7.2: Attamano āyasmā mahākassapo bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandi.
sn46.14:7.4: Tathāpahīno cāyasmato mahākassapassa so ābādho ahosīti.
